mapper.select: SELECT store_id, ${month}, image, storename FROM ( SELECT d.store_id, d.${month}, r.image, r.storename FROM ddabong d JOIN registration r ON d.store_id = r.store_id ORDER BY d.${month} DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT store_id, sum, image, storename FROM ( SELECT d.store_id, (d.jan+d.feb+d.mar+d.apr+d.may+d.jun+d.jul+d.aug+d.sep+d.oct+d.nov+d.dcb) as sum, r.image, r.storename FROM ddabong d JOIN registration r ON d.store_id = r.store_id ORDER BY (d.jan+d.feb+d.mar+d.apr+d.may+d.jun+d.jul+d.aug+d.sep+d.oct+d.nov+d.dcb) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.store_id, b.storename, b.image, b.lineintro FROM reservation a JOIN registration b ON a.store_id = b.store_id GROUP BY a.store_id, b.storename, b.image, b.lineintro ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
